verbs.description: Trump [V: is] slated to sign the controversial bill giving patients the ability to independently request experimental medicines from drugmakers .
[ARG1: Trump] is [V: slated] [ARG2: to sign the controversial bill giving patients the ability to independently request experimental medicines from drugmakers] .
[ARG0: Trump] is slated to [V: sign] [ARG1: the controversial bill giving patients the ability to independently request experimental medicines from drugmakers] .
Trump is slated to sign [ARG0: the controversial bill] [V: giving] [ARG2: patients] [ARG1: the ability to independently request experimental medicines from drugmakers] .
Trump is slated to sign the controversial bill giving [ARG0: patients] the ability to [ARGM-MNR: independently] [V: request] [ARG1: experimental medicines] [ARG2: from drugmakers] .
